actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Claw and two Scimitars or three Noxious Blasts. It can replace one attack with use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage + 9 (2d8) acid.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d6+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Noxious Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 12 (2d8+3) acid.

actions.name: Noxious Sands (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: Vomits a cloud of tainted sand in a 15 ft. cone. Each creature in the area: 14 (4d6) slashing damage and 14 (4d6) acid (DC 13 Dex half).

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Cha (DC 14) no material components: At will: disguise self minor illusion3/day ea: charm person suggestion1/day ea: dream fear

special_abilities.name: Elemental Demise
special_abilities.desc: If the div dies its body disintegrates into a pool of noxious sludge leaving behind only equipment the div was wearing or carrying.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: In sunlight disadvantage on attacks and Wis (Perception) checks that use sight.
